## Loop while

```{r}
z <- 5
while(z >=3 && z <= 10)
{
  print(z)
  coin <- rbinom(1,1,0.5)
  
  if(coin == 1){ #Random walk
      z <- z+1
      
  }else{
      z <- z-1  
    
    }
}
  
  
```
